dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3115 IH: Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Kuster introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 to extend and expand the State Trade and Export Promotion (STEP) Grant Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2013.

section.header: Extension and Expansion of STEP grant program
section.text: Section 1207 of the Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 (15 U.S.C. 649b note) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (i), by striking 2013 and inserting 2013, and $60,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2014, 2015, and 2016; and
in subsection (j), by striking 3 and inserting 6.
